title: The height shall be restricted to permissible top elevation as mentioned on Colour Coded Zoning Maps (CCZM) prepared by the Airport Authority of India (AAI) published on its web site
clause_text: The height shall be restricted to permissible top elevation as mentioned on Colour Coded Zoning Maps (CCZM) prepared by the Airport Authority of India (AAI) published on its web site. For any additional height beyond that mentioned in i) above, prior NOC from AAI shall be submitted. For the areas depicted in red colour on CCZM, prior NOC from AAI shall be submitted. The height permitted by CCZM is indicated Above Mean Sea Level i.e. AMSL.
section: Restrictions in the vicinity of Airport

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: The height shall be restricted to permissible top elevation as mentioned on Colour Coded Zoning Maps (CCZM) prepared by the Airport Authority of India (AAI) published on its web site.
